options.label: B

options.label: B

options.text: A system to track the movement of tectonic plates

multiple-choice.question: According to the transcript, why are earthquakes hard to anticipate?

options.text: Some partially melt and release lubricating fluids, while others become dry and prone to pressure build-ups

options.text: The vibrations the Earth elicits before a quake

options.text: Long-term forecasting related to when and where earthquakes have previously occurred

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: To identify regions at risk of earthquakes using a rigorous blend of geological data

options.text: High concentrations of the radioactive isotope pair: radon and thoron

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: She needed to learn how to operate a film projector, set up a cable, and charm her way out of questioning.

options.label: D
options.text: She needed to learn how to use a screwdriver, loosen a skylight, and escape from a prison.

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.label: D
options.text: She used her skills to escape from prison and avoid capture, but she also tried to use her knowledge of Morse code to send a message for help.

options.label: B
options.text: Her execution was a heroic sacrifice, and it paved the way for freedom without ever taking a life.

options.label: C
options.text: Her execution was a turning point in the war, and it led to the defeat of the Germans.

options.label: D
options.text: Her execution was a result of her failure as a radio operator, and it led to the capture of her colleagues.
